text: The men's 4 x 100 metres relay event at the 2001 European Athletics U23 Championships was held in Amsterdam, Netherlands, at Olympisch Stadion on 14 and 15 July. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; " width="35%" |- |bgcolor="gold"|Gold|| Tomasz Kondratowicz Łukasz Chyła Marcin Płacheta Przemysław Rogowski ' |- |bgcolor="silver"|Silver|| Jonathan O'Parka Jonathan Barbour Darren Chin Ben Lewis ' |- |bgcolor="CC9966"|Bronze|| Matic Šušteršic Matic Osovnikar Boštjan Fridrih Rok Orel ' |} ==Results== ===Final=== 15 July {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !!
